ygData.subject: Re: Combat skills for mages
ygData.msgSnippet: To give you an idea of combat skills I am lvl 25 enchanter and have only like 60 maybe 70 skill in combat skills all other skill are like 125 or something like
ygData.messageBody:
To give you an idea of combat skills I am lvl 25 enchanter and have only
like 60 maybe 70 skill in combat skills all other skill are like 125 or
something like that

Leaokk

>>Ok, i have this big problem...I am a level 11 enchanter and my offense
>>and defense skills arent even at (40) yet! (the cap is 60). I fight
>>alot...with my staff...and still the skill just about never ever goes
>>up. For example the offense, defense skill went up 1 number the whole
>>time i was level 10.
>>
>>something has to be wrong!
